root.name: Air Conflicts: Aces of World War II
root.description: Air Conflicts: Aces of World War II is a game produced for the Sony PSP from Cowboy Rodeo and Graffiti Entertainment. The game features 240 missions and allows you to fly in seventeen different planes. It features a single player which allows you to name your pilot and choose a faction to fly for: United States, the USSR, Germany, or Great Britian and also features a multiplayer via Ad-Hoc. Air Conflicts : Aces of World War II has an arsenal ranging from machine guns, bombs and rockets. Your HUD features a Speed Meter, Compass, Radar, and a Damage Gauge. Dogfights and bombing runs are ever present in the game and are user friendly on account of user friendly controls.
